steps.title: CERNBox applications were updated!
steps.text: The applications integrated in the CERNBox Web interface have been updated with new features and improvements. See what's new in this quick tour!

steps.title: ODF support
steps.text:
Introducing support for editing .odt, .ods and .odp files using Collabora Online!
You can now create, edit and collaborate on Open Document Format files seamlessly within your browser.

This integration is experimental, send us your feedback!

steps.title: CodiMD improvements
steps.text: Creating collaborative Markdown notes is now easier: simply navigate to cernbox.cern.ch/codimd or select CodiMD from the app switcher in the top-left corner, to create a new note.

steps.title: ROOT viewer
steps.text:
Weâ€™ve upgraded the ROOT viewer to use root.cern/js, so new features and fixes arrive faster.
Made in cooperation with the ROOT team, this new viewer also supports much larger files than before.

steps.title: Draw.io
steps.text: Draw.io has been updated to the latest version, bringing new shapes, improved dark mode and language features to enhance your diagramming experience within CERNBox Web.

steps.title: Jupyter Viewer
steps.text:
Support for Jupyter Notebooks has been improved with support for displaying script outputs (e.g. JSROOT plots).
You can now preview .ipynb files directly in CERNBox Web with better fidelity.

steps.title: Give us your feedback
steps.text:
There have been many more improvements to the other applications integrated in CERNBox Web. We've also integrated a new application: NDMSPC viewer.

We would love to hear your thoughts and feedback on these updates!
